extensionDescription.message: Saves a link to the current active tab with its title, keywords and a long and short description as markdown, Org-Mode or plain text

previewDescription.message: This is a short description of the content of the website, usually set by the website itself, but you can change that.
previewDescription.description: Short description for the preview in the 'options' page

previewText.message:
This is the long text for the example.
You can write whatever you want here.
previewText.description: Long description for the preview in the 'options' page.

keywords.description: The plural word 'keywords' as a label for a list of keywords.

fileFormat.description: Label to choose one of the supported file formats to use.

addCurrentDate.description: Question, if the current date should be added to the file.

addYAMLFrontMatter.message: Add YAML front matter (metadata for e.g. Pandoc)?
addYAMLFrontMatter.description: Question, if YAML front matter should be added to the file.

saveWebsite.description: Title of the popup. Describes what the popup does.

keywordsCommaSep.description: Label for a list of comma separated keywords.

shortDescription.description: Label for the short description of the page's content.

longDescription.description: Label for the long description of the page's content.

saveButton.description: Label of the button to save the information to disk.
